description: Omnichannel for live streaming on social networks  We're glad that you chose to use Live4.tv's API for managing your connection with social networks.   Here in this documentation, you will find a step-by-step for integrating our API.  Feel free to contact us in case you need any help.  The login flow:  ![login flow image](https://api-stream-network.live4.tv/mermaid-diagram-login-flow.png "Login flow image")
